          <title>
            <string language="sl">Izberi trditev</string>
            <string language="en">Pick the statement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wählen Sie die Anweisung aus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sélectionnez le rapport</string>

          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Reševalec preverja pravilnost in nepravilnost trditev. Utrjujemo gibanje z očmi, koncentracijo.</string>
            <string language="en">Determining the statement that correctly describe the given picture.</string>
          </description>

          </description>
          <description>
